Theme example

This is a template showcasing the optional theme stylesheet included in Bootstrap. Use it as a starting point to create something more unique by building on or modifying it.

Cartouche

Core

Code sample

<span class="cartouche">
John Doe
</span>

Result

Simple

Addon

Size

Addon

.cartouche Addon .cartouche.blue Addon .cartouche.purple Addon .cartouche.orange Addon .cartouche.dark Addon .cartouche.red Addon .cartouche.green Addon

Size

Small (.xs)
.cartouche.purple.xs .cartouche.purple.xs .addon
Normal
.cartouche.purple .cartouche.purple .addon
Big
.cartouche.purple.big .cartouche.purple.big .addon

Icons

Based on fontello

Usage

Code sample

<div class="icon-link-outline">
  Some content here
</div>

Result

Some content here

Code sample

<div class="icon-pin-outline inverse">
  Some content here
</div>

Result

Some content here

Color

Code sample

<div class="icon-tag inverse green">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse orange">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse blue">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse purple">Icon</div>
<div class="icon-tag inverse red">Icon</div>

Result

XS Card

Standard Card
